name: My Unfinished Beach
description:
A small project I started in 2015 about the frustration of the everyday routine and dreaming every night of the summer vacation.

The name of the small place you get to explore is called Alpaca Beach, a place that only exists in your nostalgic dreams about having endless free time

This "piece of software" ended up being unfinished, hence the name of it. You can walk around it if you want.

Use WASD to move and the mouse click to interact with everything.
